app.title: Internationalization of a React application
app.subtitle: Learning to install and configure internationalization library
app.about_me_text: Hi, I'm Ana Beatriz, a passionate software developer with a strong command of JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, NestJS, React, HTML, CSS and Flutter for mobile applications. I have an innate ability to learn quickly and I love facing challenges that push me to surpass my limits on a daily basis. With experience in team leadership, I found constant motivation in the inspiration of others. Always looking to improve, I am determined to stand out and leave a positive mark in everything I do.
